original: atha vā, nānarthikā punaḥśrutiḥ, arthavādārthā bhaviṣyatīty ucyate /

original: kim arthavādena prayojanam? yadā pūrvenaiva vākyena sārthavādakena vihitaḥ āgneyaḥ, kamanyam arthaṃ vidhātum śrutiḥ prayujyeta? śrutimātraṃ yan na kasyacid vidhānārtham, tad anarthakam, ity uktam, āmnāyasya kriyārthatvād ānarthakyam atadarthānām iti, śrutaś cāśrutaś ca tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ, yathā śrutā cāśrutā ca devatā aṅgabhāvaṃ sādhayati, evam etad iti /
analyzed: kim arthavādena prayojanam yadā pūrvena eva vākyena sārthavādakena vihitaḥ āgneyaḥ kam anyam artham vidhātum śrutiḥ prayujyeta śruti mātram yat na kasyacid vidhāna artham tat anarthakam iti uktam āmnāyasya kriyā artha tvāt ānarthakyam a tad arthānām iti śrutaḥ ca a śrutaḥ ca tāvān eva saḥ rthaḥ yathā śrutā ca a śrutā ca devatā aṅga bhāvam sādhayati evam etat iti

original: tad ucyate — anyārthā vā punaḥśrutiḥ, na āgneyaṃ vidhātum, aindrāgnavidhānārthā, āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ bhavaty eva, na kevalenāgninā sa sādhur bhavatītīndrasahito 'gniḥ samīcīnataraḥ, tasmād aindrāgnaḥ kartavya iti /
analyzed: tat ucyate anya arthā vā punaḥśrutiḥ na āgneyam vidhātum aindrāgna vidhāna arthā āgneyaḥ u ṣṭākapālaḥ māvāsyāyām bhavati eva na kevalena agninā sa sādhuḥ bhavati iti indra sahitaḥ gniḥ samīcīnataraḥ tasmāt aindrāgnaḥ kartavyaḥ iti

original: yāvajjīviko 'bhyāsaḥ karmadharmaḥ prakaraṇāt //
analyzed: yāvajjīvikaḥ bhyāsaḥ karma dharmaḥ prakaraṇāt

original: bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe śrūyate — yāvajjīvam agnihotraṃ juhotīti, yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām yajeteti /
analyzed: bahvṛca brāhmaṇe śrūyate yāvajjīvam agnihotram juhoti iti yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti

original: atra sandeheḥ — kiṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāso yāvajjīvikatā, uta kartṛdharmo niyamaś codyate yāvajjīvikateti /
analyzed: atra sandeheḥ  /

original: kathaṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāsaḥ, kathaṃ vā kartṛdharmo niyama iti /
analyzed: katham karma dharmaḥ bhyāsaḥ katham vā kartṛ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ iti

original: yadi juhotir anuvādaḥ, yāvajjīvam iti vidhiḥ /
analyzed: yadi juhotiḥ anuvādaḥ yāvajjīvam iti vidhiḥ

analyzed: tatas karma dharmaḥ bhyāsaḥ yadi viparītam tatas kartṛ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ iti

original: kiṃ tāvat prāptam, karmadharmo 'bhyāsaḥ /
analyzed: kim tāvat prāptam karma dharmaḥ bhyāsaḥ

original: kutaḥ? prakaraṇāt, yadīyaṃ vacanavyaktiḥ, juhotiyajatiśabdāv anuvādau, yāvajjīvam iti ca vidhiḥ, tataḥ prakaraṇam anugṛhyate, tasmād abhyāsaḥ /
analyzed: kutas prakaraṇāt yadi iyam vacana vyaktiḥ juhoti yajati śabdau anuvādau yāvajjīvam iti ca vidhiḥ tatas prakaraṇam anugṛhyate tasmāt abhyāsaḥ

original: evaṃ kṛtvā satrasaṃstavo yukto bhaviṣyati, jarāmaryaṃ vā etat satraṃ yad agnihotram, darśapūrṇamāsau ceti dīrghakālasāmānyāt /
analyzed: evam kṛtvā satra saṃstavaḥ yuktaḥ bhaviṣyati jarā maryam vai etat satram yat agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau ca iti dīrgha kāla sāmānyāt

original: tasmād abhyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt abhyāsaḥ

original: kartur vā śrutisaṃyogāt //
analyzed: kartuḥ vā śruti saṃyogāt

original: liṅgadarśanāc ca, karmadharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta, tatrānarthakam anyat syāt //
analyzed: liṅga darśanāt ca karma dharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta tatra anarthakam anyat syāt

original: liṅgaṃ ca bhavaty api ha vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayeteti /
analyzed: liṅgam ca bhavati api ha vai eṣa svargāt lokāt chidyate yaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa yājī paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyām vā atipātayeta iti

original: kathaṃ liṅgam? karmadharme hi prakrāntaṃ satraṃ yāvajjīvanakālena parisamāpyeta, na tatra kālātipātaḥ syāt /
analyzed: katham liṅgam karma dharme hi prakrāntam satram yāvat jīvana kālena parisamāpyeta na tatra kāla atipātaḥ syāt

original: tatra cānarthakam anyat syāt prāyaścittādi vidhīyamānam /
analyzed: tatra ca anarthakam anyat syāt prāyaścitta ādi vidhīyamānam

original: vyapavargaṃ ca darśayati, kālaś cet karmabhedaḥ syāt //
analyzed: vyapavargam ca darśayati kālaḥ ced karma bhedaḥ syāt

original: anityatvāt tu naivaṃ syāt //
analyzed: anitya tvāt tu na evam syāt

original: tuśabdo 'nvācaye, itaraś ca paśyāmaḥ, kartur dharmo niyamaś codyata iti /
analyzed: tuśabdaḥ nu ācaye itaraḥ ca paśyāmaḥ kartuḥ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ codyate iti

original: yadi pūrvasya homasya guṇavidhir bhavet sa ekaikaḥ pūrvo 'gnihotrahomo 'nityaḥ syāt, kāmasaṃyogena śruto nānyaḥ kaścin nityaḥ, tatra liṅgaṃ virudhyeta, jarāmaryaṃ vaitat satraṃ yad agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau, jarayā vaitābhyāṃ nirmucyate mṛtyunā ceti /
analyzed: yadi pūrvasya homasya guṇa vidhiḥ bhavet saḥ ekaikaḥ pūrvaḥ gnihotra homaḥ nityaḥ syāt kāma saṃyogena śrutaḥ na anyaḥ kaścid nityaḥ tatra liṅgam virudhyeta jarā maryam vai tat satram yat agnihotram darśa pūrṇamāsau jarayā vā etābhyām nirmucyate mṛtyunā ca iti

original: kathaṃ virudhyate? jarāmaraṇanirmocanādhāraṇavacanaṃ niyamapakṣa upapadyate, kāmyapakṣe 'prayogād api mucyeta /
analyzed: katham virudhyate jarā maraṇa nirmocana ādhāraṇa vacanam niyama pakṣe upapadyate kāmya pakṣe prayogāt api mucyeta

original: virodhaś cāpi pūrvavat //
analyzed: virodhaḥ ca api pūrvavat

original: itaś ca paśyāmo na pūrvābhyāso guṇaś codyata iti /
analyzed: itas ca paśyāmaḥ na pūrva abhyāsaḥ guṇaḥ codyate iti

original: kutaḥ? virodhāt, virodho bhavati, darśapūrṇamāsavikārāḥ sauryādayo 'pi yāvajjīvam abhyasitavyā bhaveyuḥ /

original: so 'nārabhyārthaḥ pratijñātaḥ syāt /
analyzed: saḥ na ārabhya arthaḥ pratijñātaḥ syāt

original: ato 'pi paśyāmo niyama iti satrasaṃstavaś ca santatabhāvam upapatsyate /
analyzed: atas pi paśyāmaḥ niyamaḥ iti satra saṃstavaḥ ca santata bhāvam upapatsyate

original: kartus tu dharmaniyamāt kālaśāstraṃ nimittaṃ syāt //
analyzed: kartuḥ tu dharma niyamāt kālaśāstram nimittam syāt

original: yadi kartur dharmo niyamaś codyeta, tato jīvanaṃ nimittam, jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate /
analyzed: yadi kartuḥ dharmaḥ niyamaḥ codyeta tatas jīvanam nimittam jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate

original: tatra prayoge parisamāptaṃ karma, tathā vyapavargasya darśanam akḷptaṃ bhavati, tasmāt kartṛdharmo niyamaś codyata iti siddhaṃ bhavati /

original: nāmarūpadharmaviśeṣapunaruktinindāśaktisamāptivacanaprāyaścittānyārthadarśanāc chākhāntareṣu karmabhedaḥ syāt //
analyzed: nāma rūpa dharma viśeṣa punarukti nindā śakti samāpti vacana prāyaścitta anya artha darśanāt śākhā antareṣu karma bhedaḥ syāt

original: iha śākhāntarāṇy udāharaṇam, kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakaṃ paippalādakam ityevamādīni /

original: tatra sandehaḥ, kim ekasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ yat karmāgnihotrādi śrūyate, tac chākhāntare punaḥ śrūyamāṇam bhidyeta tasmāt, uta na bhidyeta? bhidyeteti paśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sandehaḥ kim ekasyām śākhāyām yat karma agnihotra ādi śrūyate tat śākhā antare punar śrūyamāṇam bhidyeta tasmāt uta na bhidyeta bhidyeta iti paśyāmaḥ

original: kutaḥ? nāmabhedāt, ekaṃ kāṭhakaṃ nāma, anyat kālāpakaṃ nāma, evaṃ nāmabhedād bhedaḥ /
analyzed: kutas nāma bhedāt ekam kāṭhakam nāma anyat kālāpakam nāma evam nāma bhedāt bhedaḥ

original: nanu granthanāmaitat /
analyzed: nanu grantha nāma etat

original: satyam, karmaṇām apīti brūmaḥ, karmabhir apy evamādīnāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ekavibhaktitvaṃ ceti /
analyzed: satyam karmaṇām api iti brūmaḥ karmabhiḥ api evamādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam eka vibhakti tvam ca iti

original: rūpabhedāc ca, ekasyāṃ śākhāyām agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālam āmananti, ekasyāṃ dvādaśakapālam, evaṃ bhinnaṃ rūpam, katham iva na karmāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati /

original: nindāvacanāc ca prātaḥ prātaranṛtaṃ te vadanti purodayā juhvati ye 'gnihotraṃ divākīrtyam ādivā kīrtayantaḥ sūryo jyotir na tadā jyotir eṣām iti kecic chākhino 'nuditahomaṃ nindanti, apare punar uditahomaṃ nindanti, yathātithaye pradrutāyānnam āhareyus tādṛk tad yady udite juhvatīti, sarvaśākhyāpratyaye viruddham, na tu karmabhede, tasmād api bheda iti /
analyzed: nindā vacanāt ca prātar prātar anṛtam te vadanti purā udayāḥ juhvati ye gnihotram divākīrtyam ā divā kīrtayantaḥ sūryaḥ jyotiḥ na tadā jyotiḥ eṣām iti kecid śākhinaḥ nudita homam nindanti apare punar udita homam nindanti yathā atithaye pradrutāya annam āhareyuḥ tādṛś tat yadi udite juhvati iti sarva śākhyā pratyaye viruddham na tu karma bhede tasmāt api bhedaḥ iti

original: aśakteś ca, na śaknuyuḥ khalv api sarvaśākhāpratyayam upasaṃhartum, tatrānārabhyo 'rtho vidhīyata iti pratijñātaṃ bhavet, śakyaṃ tu karmabhede, ataḥ karmabheda iti /
analyzed: aśakteḥ ca na śaknuyuḥ khalu api sarva śākhā pratyayam upasaṃhartum tatra an ārabhyaḥ rthaḥ vidhīyate iti pratijñātam bhavet śakyam tu karma bhede atas karma bhedaḥ iti

original: samāptivacanāc ca, asamāpte 'pi samāpter vacanaṃ bhavati, kecid āhuḥ, atrāsmākam agniḥ parisamāpyata iti, apare 'nyaparisamāptiṃ vyapadiśanti, tad ekakarmatve nopapadyate, na hi tatra ca parisamāpyeta, anyatra na /
analyzed: samāpti vacanāt ca a samāpte samāpteḥ vacanam bhavati kecid āhuḥ atra asmākam agniḥ parisamāpyate iti apare vyapadiśanti tat eka karma tve na upapadyate na hi tatra ca parisamāpyeta anyatra na

original: bhede tu yuktam, tasmād bheda iti /
analyzed: bhede tu yuktam tasmāt bhedaḥ iti

original: prāyaścittavidhānāc ca, kecid anuditahomavyatikrame prāyaścittam āmananti, kecid uditahomavyatikrame vṛddhe ca prāyaścittam, na ca karmaikatva ubhayathā vṛddhiḥ saṃbhavati, karmabhede tu yad anudite homakarma, tad udite vṛddham, itarad apy udite, tasmād api bhedaḥ /

original: athāparaṃ liṅgadarśanam, yat pakṣasamitāṃ pinuyāt kanīyāṃsaṃ yajñakratum upeyāt kanīyasīṃ prajñāṃ kanīyasaḥ paśūn kanīyo 'nnādyaṃ pāpīyān syāt, atha yadi vedisaṃmityā minotīti pakṣasamāne pratiṣiddhe vedisaṃmānasya darśanaṃ bhavati, tat tu karmabheda upapadyate, pākṣikasya vedisaṃmānasya darśanam ekakarmatve nopapadyate /
analyzed: atha aparam liṅga darśanam yat pakṣa samitām pinuyāt kanīyāṃsam yajña kratum upeyāt kanīyasīm prajñām kanīyasaḥ paśūn kanīyaḥ annādyam pāpīyān syāt atha yadi vedi saṃmityā minoti iti pakṣa samāne pratiṣiddhe vedi saṃmānasya darśanam bhavati tat tu karma bhede upapadyate pākṣikasya vedi saṃmānasya darśanam eka karma tve na upapadyate

original: katham? eke hi samāmananti, rathākṣamātrāṇi yūpāntarālāni bhavantīti, tat sarvatra syāt, tatra ca no pakṣasaṃmānaṃ no vedisaṃmānaṃ syāt, vedisaṃmānadarśanaṃ nopapadyate, tasmād api karmabhedaḥ /
analyzed: katham eke hi samāmananti ratha akṣa mātrāṇi yūpa antarālāni bhavanti iti tat sarvatra syāt tatra ca na u pakṣa saṃmānam na u vedi saṃmānam syāt vedi saṃmāna darśanam na upapadyate tasmāt api karma bhedaḥ

original: aparaṃ ca liṅgadarśanam, keṣāṃcij jyotiṣṭome śrūyate, dve saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyeta iti, pareṣāṃ tisraḥ saṃstutānāṃ virājam atiricyanta ity ekakarmatve virodhaḥ, nānākarmatve kasmiṃścij jyotiṣṭome dve, kasmiṃścit tisraḥ, tasmāt karmabheda iti /
analyzed: aparam ca liṅga darśanam keṣāṃcid jyotiṣṭome śrūyate dve saṃstutānām virājam atiricyeta iti pareṣām tisraḥ saṃstutānām virājam atiricyante iti eka karma tve virodhaḥ nānā karma tve kasmiṃścid jyotiṣṭome dve kasmiṃścid tisraḥ tasmāt karma bhedaḥ iti

original: api ca sārasvate śrūyate, ye puroḍāśinas te upaviśanti ye sānnāyinas te vatsān vārayanti /
analyzed: api ca sārasvate śrūyate ye puroḍāśinaḥ te upaviśanti ye sānnāyinaḥ te vatsān vārayanti

original: sānnāyina iṣṭaprathamayajñāḥ, puroḍāśino viparītāḥ, ubhayeṣāṃ sārasvate darśanam avakalpate karmabhede, ekakarmatve sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣṭomapūrvatvaṃ syāt, tatra darśanaṃ nopapadyate /
analyzed: sānnāyinaḥ iṣṭa prathama yajñāḥ puroḍāśinaḥ viparītāḥ ubhayeṣām sārasvate darśanam avakalpate karma bhede eka karma tve sarveṣām jyotiṣṭoma pūrva tvam syāt tatra darśanam na upapadyate

original: ekaṃ vā saṃyogarūpacodanākhyāviśeṣāt //
analyzed: ekam vā saṃyoga rūpa codana ākhyā viśeṣāt

original: na caitad asti, yad uktam — śākhāntareṣu karmabheda iti, sarvaśākhāpratyayaṃ sarvabrāhmaṇapratyayaṃ caikaṃ karma, arthasaṃyogasyāviśeṣāt, tad eva prayojanam uddiśya tad eva vidhīyamānaṃ pratyabhijānīmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca etat asti yat uktam śākhā antareṣu karma bhedaḥ iti sarva śākhā pratyayam sarva brāhmaṇa pratyayam ca ekam karma artha saṃyogasya aviśeṣāt tat eva prayojanam uddiśya tat eva vidhīyamānam pratyabhijānīmaḥ

original: rūpam apy asya tad eva dravyadevatam, puruṣaprayatnaś ca tādṛśa eva codyate, nāmadheyaṃ cāviśiṣṭam, tena tad eva karma sarvaśākhādiṣv iti pratyayaḥ /
analyzed: rūpam api asya tat eva dravya devatam puruṣa prayatnaḥ ca tādṛśaḥ eva codyate nāmadheyam ca a viśiṣṭam tena tat eva karma sarva śākhā ādiṣu iti pratyayaḥ

original: na nāmnā syād acodanābhidhānatvāt //
analyzed: na nāmnā syāt a codana abhidhāna tvāt

original: yad uktam — nāmabheda iti, parihṛtaṃ tad granthanām ata iti /
analyzed: yat uktam nāma bhedaḥ iti parihṛtam tat granthanām atas iti

original: atha yad uktam — karmaṇo 'pi nāmasāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanād iti /
analyzed: atha yat uktam karmaṇaḥ pi nāma sāmānādhikaraṇya darśanāt iti

original: naiṣa doṣaḥ, granthasaṃyogāt karma kāṭhakādi, na karmasaṃyogād granthaḥ kāṭhakaḥ /
analyzed: na eṣa doṣaḥ grantha saṃyogāt karma kāṭhaka ādi na karma saṃyogāt granthaḥ kāṭhakaḥ

original: kathaṃ gamyate? yat karma kāṭhakādisaṃyuktam, tat kāṭhakādiśabdenocyate /
analyzed: katham gamyate yat karma kāṭhaka ādi saṃyuktam tat kāṭhaka ādi śabdena ucyate

original: kim ato 'pi? yad granthasaṃyogāt kāṭhakaṃ kālāpakaṃ karmocyate /

original: ekatve 'pi kāṭhakagranthasaṃyogāt kāṭhakam, kālāpakagranthasaṃyogāt tu kālāpakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: eka tve pi kāṭhaka grantha saṃyogāt kāṭhakam kālāpaka grantha saṃyogāt tu kālāpakam bhaviṣyati

original: sarveṣāṃ caikakarmyaṃ syāt //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca aikakarmyam syāt

original: yadi śabdabhedād bhedo bhavet, śabdaikyāt tarhi karmaikyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yadi śabda bhedāt bhedaḥ bhavet śabda aikyāt tarhi karma aikyam bhavet

original: tatra kāṭhakaśabdābhidhānād aikyaṃ bhaved agnihotrasya darśapūrṇamāsayor jyotiṣṭomasya ca, tacchabdatvāt, na caitad evam /
analyzed: tatra kāṭhaka śabda abhidhānāt aikyam bhavet agnihotrasya darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ jyotiṣṭomasya ca tad śabda tvāt na ca etat evam

original: tasmād apy abhedaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt api abhedaḥ

original: kṛtakaṃ cābhidhānam //
analyzed: kṛtakam ca abhidhānam

original: idānīṃtanaṃ caitad abhidhānaṃ bhavet, asya na pūrvam āsīt, yataḥ prabhṛti kaṭhasya prakṛṣṭaṃ vacanam, tataḥ prabhṛti pravṛttam, pūrvaṃ nāsīd bhedaḥ, idānīṃ bheda iti viruddham /
analyzed: idānīṃtanam ca etat abhidhānam bhavet asya na pūrvam āsīt yatas prabhṛti kaṭhasya prakṛṣṭam vacanam tatas prabhṛti pravṛttam pūrvam na āsīt bhedaḥ idānīm bhedaḥ iti viruddham

original: ekatve 'pi param //

original: tatra saṃdehaḥ — kim aindreṣv anaindreṣu ca mantraḥ, utaindreṣv eva mantraḥ, anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti /

original: kutaḥ? samānavidhānāny etāni pradānāni, teṣv indrapītasyeti mantro 'nindrapītaṃ na śaknoti vaditum, na ca samānaprakaraṇa ūhaḥ saṃbhavati, asati vacane 'nyārthānabhidhānāt /

original: athavā yathādevatam ūhena lakṣayitavyam kasmāt? dhruvacamasā hi prakṛtibhūtāḥ /

original: katham avagamyate? tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayati /
analyzed: katham avagamyate tad prakṛti tvam hi darśayati
